__e: Have you ever thought about, I don't know, staying with Niles for a while?
Oh, come on, Niles, why don't you tell me what's really on your mind?
Oh, Niles, why don't you just go talk to him?
Niles and I have decided to keep a few things at each other's houses. You know, save running back and forth.
You remember my brother, Niles, and uh... we're at "our" table.
You know, Dad, Niles and I have been wondering what to get you for your wedding.
Niles didn't ask me to come here, I came because I care about both of you.
Please, Niles, I hardly think it's the same thing.
Listen, if Niles isn't coming, maybe you can tell us what the big surprise is.
Anyway, today I ask you to look after my brother, Niles Crane.
I'm Mrs. Niles Crane, and I don't want to keep it a secret.
This is my brother, Dr Niles Crane.
And then I understood that of course my oven mitt is exactly what I wanted, and goodness gracious it was under any nose the entire time.
Niles, what has happened to your child?
